titles.title: A bill for the relief of Joseph Keusch.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/17/1987--Introduced. Directs that a named individual continue to be classified a nonimmigrant alien within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act and be permitted to remain in the United States until a specified date.
